product_name: Patagonia Micro D Zip-Neck Fleece Top - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Patagonia Micro D Zip-Neck fleece top for girls offers irresistible comfort for cool-weather bouldering, scrambling or just knocking about. Wear it next to skin for insulation or as an outer layer. Soft, partially recycled midweight microfleece is plush, warm, quick-drying and easy to layer under other clothing. Quarter-length zip neck with tall cozy collar and internal windflap keeps kids warm or vents excess heat. Closeout.
short_description: Patagonia Micro D Zip-Neck fleece top for girls offers irresistible comfort for cool-weather bouldering, scrambling or just knocking about. Wear it next to skin for insulation or as an outer layer.
